revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Kingston |model=Wi-Drive+ |revision=(WIDP) |asin= |manuf_country=China |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=WLU6250 |manuf_rev=-D14 |availability= |fcc_date=11/21/2012 |fcc_id=ZME-WIDP |pcb_id= |type=wireless storage device |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM1806S |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Nuvoton |cpu2_model=N79E824;N79E824ARG; |cpu2_cspeed=20 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25639F |fla2=8 KiB |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT46H64M16LFBF-6 IT:B |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=AMPAK GB96362G0 |wi1_module_if=on-board SiP |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43362 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=portable, battery |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= }} "WLU6250-D14" and "REV:2A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per the FCC photos, the device is using... *a ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' AM1806S (??) (AM1806S, ZCE, 19A69ZW GI 456, :21 527 ZCE) microprocessor ([http://www.ti.com/product/am1806 ARM926EJ-S] core) *a ''Micron'' MT46H64M16LFBF-6 IT:B 1Gb RAM chip (FBGA code: D9LRD) *a [http://www.macnica.com/web/usa/genesys-product-list ''Genesys Logic'' GL836 USB Card Reader IC] :(would appear to be for the full size SD Card slot) *an [http://www.ite.com.tw/EN/products_more.aspx?CategoryID=4&ID=14,125 ''ITE'' IT1326 (IT1326E-48) USB 2.0 SD/MMC Card Reader IC] :(would appear to be for the microSD slot) *a ''Genesys Logic'' GL850G (GL850G, IJC0291, 1472908) USB 2.0 Hub IC *a ''[[Nuvoton]]'' N79E824ARG Microcontroller (8051 MCU 8-bit @20MHz 8KB) *an ''[[AMPAK]]'' (''[[Gemtek]]'' subsidiary) [http://www.match-elec.com/Ampak/GB96362G.pdf GB96362G0 WiFi module] (802.11bgn, :1x1:1, SIP, BCM43362 based), [http://www.gemtek.com.tw/specs/GB96362G_V01.pdf Gemtek spec sheet] *a ''Getac'' BP-WLU-11/2000 CL Li-poly battery (3.7V, 2000mAh, 7.4Wh)
